books.title: NCERT Physics Class 12 Part 1
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Physics, Part 1. Covers topics like Electrostatics, Current Electricity, and Magnetism.

books.title: NCERT Physics Class 12 Part 2
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Physics, Part 2. Covers topics like Optics, Dual Nature of Radiation, and Semiconductor Electronics.

books.title: NCERT Chemistry Class 12 Part 1
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Chemistry, Part 1. Covers Solid State, Solutions, Electrochemistry, and p-Block Elements.

books.title: NCERT Chemistry Class 12 Part 2
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Chemistry, Part 2. Covers Organic Chemistry topics, Biomolecules, and Polymers.

books.title: NCERT Maths Class 12 Part 1
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Mathematics, Part 1. Covers Relations and Functions, Matrices, and Calculus.

books.title: NCERT Biology Class 12
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 12 Biology. Covers Reproduction, Genetics and Evolution, Biology and Human Welfare, Biotechnology, and Ecology.

books.title: NCERT Maths Class 11
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 11 Mathematics. Covers Sets, Relations and Functions, Trigonometric Functions, and more.

books.title: NCERT Physics Class 11 Part 1
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 11 Physics, Part 1. Covers Physical World, Units and Measurements, and Laws of Motion.

books.title: NCERT Chemistry Class 11 Part 1
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 11 Chemistry, Part 1. Covers basic concepts, structure of atom, and classification of elements.

books.title: NCERT Biology Class 11
books.author: NCERT
books.description: Official NCERT textbook for Class 11 Biology. Covers Diversity in Living World, Structural Organisation in Animals and Plants, and Cell Structure.

books.title: General Knowledge 2025
books.author: Arihant Experts
books.description: A comprehensive book for competitive exams, covering a wide range of topics including history, geography, science, and current affairs.

books.title: Learn Python in One Day
books.author: Krishna Rungta
books.description: A beginner-friendly guide to learning Python programming from scratch. Covers all the basic concepts with examples.
